issues.message: Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<TKey, System.Collections.Generic.HashSet<TVal>>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<TKey, System.Collections.Generic.HashSet<TVal>>'.

Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<TKey, System.Collections.Generic.HashSet<TVal>>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<TKey, System.Collections.Generic.HashSet<TVal>>'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Data.IDataRecord' instead of 'System.Data.Common.DbDataReader'.
